title: Riskcovry
description: Enterprise product following a B2B2C model, which provides customers with a SaaS & API-first platform. This empowers them to offer a comprehensive range of insurance services to end-consumers without compromising their brand experience. Through our platform, customers can effortlessly handle all aspects of insurance, including purchasing, management, and claims processing.

title: Chad Trader
description: Crafted a high-conversion landing page for “Chad Trader,” featuring mentorship-driven trading programs and compelling calls-to-action to drive user sign-ups.

title: 6Enigma
description: Comprehensive data analytics portal facilitating both client and admin access, enabling real-time monitoring of video editing workflows, performance metrics, and user engagement insights.

title: TraceLyfe
description: Tracelyfe is a compact, ABDM-certified micro-Hospital Management Information System (HMIS) featuring integrated patient engagement and vitals-tracing capabilities that streamline health record management. Designed to simplify healthcare workflows, Tracelyfe enables seamless data handling by leveraging the Ayushman Bharat Digital Mission (ABDM) integration for efficient operations and enhanced patient care.

title: Extramileplay
description: A website specifically designed for organizations to efficiently manage their subscribed games. With this platform, organizations can easily handle user management and grant users access to play games based on their subscriptions. It provides a seamless and user-friendly experience for both the organization and its users.

title: Kalanju
description: Employee Management site that serves as a comprehensive solution for handling various aspects of employee data, assets, projects, leads, invoices, leaves, and other organizational matters. This all-in-one site streamlines the management process and provides an efficient platform for addressing various organizational needs.

title: Owlprints
description: A comprehensive website catering to a B2B t-shirt printing company. The website includes an efficient admin portal enabling seamless management of all bulk orders, invoices, and related tasks for merchants. Additionally, there's a user-friendly merchant site where clients can conveniently place orders for custom printed shirts, specifying their desired designs, colors, and other personalized details. This platform offers a streamlined experience for both the company and its merchants, facilitating smooth transactions and customizations for bulk t-shirt orders.
